module.dgmodules.dragon_guard.desc: Prevents a lethal blow by consuming a massive amount of energy.
tooltip.dgmodules.hp_damage.desc: Deals extra damage based on the target's current health
tooltip.dgmodules.hp_cut.total: Life Reduction Total: %s%% (based on target current health)
module.dgmodules.negative_effect_immunit: Immune to all harmful potion effects
module.dgmodules.compressed_chaotic_ener: Compresses 3 chaotic energy modules into a 2×1 module, providing higher energy capacity and transfer.
module.dgmodules.compressed_chaotic_shie: Compresses 3 chaotic shield recovery modules into a 2×1 module, greatly increasing shield recharge.
item.dgmodules.compressed_chaotic_large_: Compressed Chaotic Large Shield Capacity Module
module.dgmodules.compressed_chaotic_larg: Compresses 3 chaotic large shield capacity modules into a 3×2 module, greatly increasing shield capacity.
module.dgmodules.compressed_chaotic_dama: Compresses 3 chaotic damage modules into a 2×1 module, significantly increasing damage.
module.dgmodules.compressed_chaotic_spee: Compresses 3 chaotic speed modules into a 2×1 module, significantly increasing speed.
module.dgmodules.phase_shield.desc: Press the key to enter phase state: cancel all attacks and ignore all damage, draining massive OP.
tooltip.dgmodules.phase_shield.require: Requires: Shield Control Booster module installed in the chestpiece.
tooltip.dgmodules.phase_shield.cost: Drain: massive OP per tick (auto disables when out of power).
hud.dgmodules.phase_shield.on: Phase Shield enabled - it won't last long, get out of danger!
• Enhance the overall performance of the shield
